title: Kevin Richardson - Natural Clear Vision
description:
Natural Clear Vision

Dealing with dry eyes can be bothersome and dangerous in the end, but with Natural Clear Vision, you wonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t have to go through surgeries or medical procedures

How Natural Clear Vision Heals Dry Eyes? Natural Clear Vision is the suitable product to treat your dry eye issue without you having to go through surgical procedure. You may think that dry eye is a simple and unimportant problem, but do you want to have problems with your sight forever? Our eyes are one of the most important parts that we often do on daily basis. Imagine what you would do if you lost your sight? That would change your life for good, definitely. If you donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t want to suffer from such issue, be sure that you find out the core of the problem and get it done immediately.

There are 4 primary principles to clear vision training: 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢1. Physical training for eye muscles. Glasses and contacts actually WEAKEN your eye muscles, resting them until the fibers atrophy. 


Ã¢â‚¬Â¢2. Emotional training for psychological support. Emotion driven issues can worsen sight, and clear vision training helps you deal with them. 


Ã¢â‚¬Â¢3. Energy flow training for myopics (short-sighted people) that gradually makes muscles that control accommodation of the eye stronger. 


Ã¢â‚¬Â¢4. Relaxation training that reduces the tension on your eye muscles, which leads to less strain and stress, and eventually better clear vision - naturally. 

"Natural Clear Vision" is a program rooted in these 4 principles and goes into greater detail about each. 


What's In "Natural Clear Vision"?

The core product is a digitally downloaded manual (in PDF format). This collection of techniques and exercises are designed to show you how to care for your eyes, improve your vision, and even de-stress your eyes. 

All exercises are easy to carry out and won't take too much time. No complex routines. Nothing to memorize or practice many times before you get it right. These eye exercises are easy to learn, simple to remember, and convenient to carry out anywhere. 

And if you'd like to watch video tutorials that teach them, Natural Clear Vision includes many like the Natural 20/20 Instructional Video which nicely complements the manual. You can view the videos on your computer, tablet or smart mobile phone. 

There's also an eye chart that can quickly identify any pre-existing eye condition you suffer from. These are charts that professional optometrists employ in diagnosing their patients. You'll be able to run those checks on your eyes from the convenience of your home.
